amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in House Report 115-259 to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act and address the need to increase programs that educate minorities in science, technology, engineering and math.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
